content.question: The years 1930–1980 have been described by one historian as a period that saw the “rise and fall of the New Deal Order.” What is meant here by the phrase “New Deal Order”?

choices.label: An arrangement in which the United States government took an active role in regulating the economy and in mediating disputes between labor and management
A plan to allow increased free trade between the United States and Europe
An agenda pushed by congressional Republicans intent on encouraging family values and moral behavior
A program intended by congressional Democrats to promote the growth of small businesses at the expense of major corporations
A scheme designed to pave the way for a single, worldwide governing body

content.answer: An arrangement in which the United States government took an active role in regulating the economy and in mediating disputes between labor and management

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
